idea-plugin.name: Error-prone Compiler Integration
idea-plugin.description: Allows to make project using 'error-prone java compiler' (https://code.google.com/p/error-prone) to catch common Java mistakes at compile-time. To use the compiler, go to File | Settings | Compiler | 'Java Compiler' and select 'Javac with error-prone' in 'Use compiler' box.
